profile.name: Reza Nasirian
profile.tagline: AI Engineer specializing in LLM-based multi-agent systems and Business Intelligence solutions.
profile.about_text:
I'm an AI & BI Engineer with over 4 years of professional experience – starting my career as a Business Intelligence Developer and transitioning into AI Engineering over the past year.

During my 3+ years in BI (2021–2025), I designed and developed end-to-end reporting solutions, interactive dashboards (Dundas BI), multi-dimensional cubes (SSAS), and API generators, while working extensively with SQL, Python, and JavaScript.

In the last year (2025–present), I've specialized in LLM-based systems. I built a conversational multi-agent framework that enables natural language interaction with structured data – integrating LangChain, FastAPI, and real-time SSE. I also developed a graph-based RAG chatbot for Iranian tax law, significantly improving retrieval accuracy.

I'm passionate about bridging the gap between traditional data systems and modern AI, and I'm currently exploring fine-tuning and local deployment of LLMs for privacy-aware enterprise solutions.

projects.title: Tax Law RAG Chatbot
projects.content: Developed a RAG system focused on Iranian tax laws. Created a chatbot to answer queries from taxpayers and the general public using Qdrant vector store, LangChain, Python, and FastAPI.

projects.title: CubeAgent - Multi-Agent Conversational  AI System
projects.content: Designed and  developed a multi-agent framework enabling conversational interaction with structured data using LLMs. Implemented specialized agents for data analysis, query generation (MDX), and visualization.

experience.title: AI Engineer | LLM Agents
experience.description:
• Built a multi-agent system for conversational data interaction and analysis, developing specialized agents for data analysis, MDX query generation, and visualization using LangChain.  
• Developed a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system centered on Iranian tax laws, creating a chatbot for answering queries from taxpayers and the public using Qdrant vector store, LangChain, Python, and FastAPI, while implementing a graph-based structure to represent tax law hierarchies for better retrieval accuracy. 
• Implemented real-time communication via Server-Sent Events (SSE) and modular orchestration to facilitate seamless agent collaboration.
• Currently exploring fine-tuning techniques and local model deployment to enhance system autonomy.

experience.title: Business Intelligence Developer
experience.description:
• Developed backend API queries to efficiently retrieve and provide data for reporting purposes.
• Created an API generator tool for generating APIs from arbitrary database tables without coding, including adding conditions to the generated APIs.
• Composed complex queries and extracted report data to support business intelligence efforts.
• Designed and developed interactive BI dashboards using Dundas BI, enabling data-driven decision-making.
• Utilized JavaScript to enhance dashboard functionality and customize features.
• Integrated web services data using Python, expanding data sources for reporting.
• Utilized SSAS (SQL Server Analysis Services) to design multi-dimensional data cubes.
• Worked with Postman to test and validate APIs, ensuring data accuracy and reliability.

services.title: AI & ML Solutions
services.description: Development of conversational AI systems, data analysis, and machine learning solutions tailored to your business needs.

services.title: Custom Web Development
services.description: End-to-end development of custom web applications, using modern web technologies like Django, and FastAPI.

services.title: Business Intelligence
services.description: Interactive BI dashboards and reporting solutions using tools like Dundas BI, SQL, and Python.

education.degree: Master of Science in Industrial Engineering
education.description: Focus on advanced data analysis, optimization, and modeling of complex systems. Research involves application of machine learning and LLMs in industrial contexts.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Industrial Engineering
education.institution: Iran University of Science and Technology (IUST)
education.description: Comprehensive education in industrial engineering principles, including operations research, production planning, quality control, and information systems.
